titleStmt.title: The scolding wives vindication: or, An answer to the cuckold's complaint. Wherein she shows what just reasons she had to exercise severity over her insufficient husband. To the tune of, The cuckold's complaint. Licensed according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby, J. Deacon, J. Blare, J. Back.,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "I have been abus'd of late ..."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library and the British Library.
